desc: Colemanoliveoilco.com carry the largest selection of infused Olive oils and balsamic vinegar in central Texas. We also carry hand made pastas, mustards, jams and spices that complement our oils and vinegars. Located in Coleman, Texas and online. Come see us for a personal experience or visit us online.

layout.text: We carry the finest infused EVOO from Tunisia and Balsamic Vinegar from Modena, Italy.

All of our oils come from Tunisia and are grown naturally without irrigation or harmful pesticides or chemical fertilizers. They are hand harvested and processed within two hours to bring you not only a fresh but healthy alternative way to prepare the food you serve your family
